Mod0_Description: {c_important}Dash{/c} Slows enemies it hits by {c_number}[{SF_19}* 100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}{buffduration:SLOW}{/c} seconds. Any enemy already Slowed will be {c_important}{u}Dazed{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} seconds instead.
Mod2_Description: Enemies damaged by {c_important}Dash{/c} take {c_number}[{SF_20}*100|%x|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage from you for {c_number}{buffduration:BONUS_CRIT_DAMAGE}{/c} seconds.
Mod1_Description: Dealing damage to Crowd Controlled enemies with {c_important}Dash{/c} reduces its Charge Cooldown by {c_number}[{SF_16}|1|]{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}{SF_17}{/c} seconds per cast.
name: Dash
